attributes.action: Include cats within the Road Traffic Act 1988
attributes.additional_details: After losing my beloved cat Obi to this, and personally feeling the heartbreak after searching for weeks, for hoping for a safe return, just to find that someone had left my poor boy to die alone on the side of the road, I believe cats need to be included in the RTA 1988 law. Having to go collect his body and identify him has been one of the most devasting things I have had to go through, he deserved so much better, and so do all the other beloved pets not protected by this law.
attributes.background: Cats deserve the same justice as any other animal included on the Road Traffic Act 1988. They are just as loved and as part of the family as a dog so should deserve the same justice when the unthinkable happens. #JusticeForObi #EqualRightsForCats
